import json
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 
 instance_xml = """<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <instance>
 <parameter id="json">%s</parameter>
 </instance>
 """ % (json.dumps({
 "timezone": "Europe/Paris",
 "site-id": "erp5",
 "erp5-ca": {
 "country-code": "FR",
 "email": "admin@vifib.org",
 "state": "Nord-Pas-de-Calais",
 "city": "Lille",
 "company": "ViFiB SARL"
 },
 "backend": {
 "login": {
 "zopecount": 1,
 "access-control-string": "all",
 "scheme": ["https"],
 "maxconn": 1,
 "thread-amount": 1},
 "erp5": {
 "zopecount": 1,
 "access-control-string": "all",
 "scheme": ["https"],
 "maxconn": 1,
 "thread-amount": 1},
 "service": {
 "no-timeout": True,
 "http-cache": True,
 "zopecount": 2,
 "access-control-string": "all",
 "scheme": ["https"],
 "maxconn": 1,
 "ssl-authentication": True,
 "backend-path": "/%(site-id)s/portal_slap",
 "thread-amount": 1},
 "shacacheupload": {
 "no-timeout": True,
 "zopecount": 1,
 "access-control-string": "all",
 "scheme": ["https"],
 "maxconn": 1,
 "ssl-authentication": True,
 "backend-path": "/%(site-id)s/web_site_module",
 "thread-amount": 1},
 "shacachedownload": {
 "no-timeout": True,
 "http-cache": True,
 "zopecount": 1,
 "access-control-string": "all",
 "scheme": ["http"],
 "maxconn": 1,
 "backend-path": "/%(site-id)s/web_site_module",
 "thread-amount": 1}
 },
 "zeo": {
 "Zeo-Server-1": [{
 "zodb-name": "main",
 "serialize-path": "/%(site-id)s/account_module/",
 "mount-point": "/",
 "zope-cache-size": "2000",
 "storage-name": "main",
 "zeo-cache-size": "400MB"}]
 },
 "activity": {
 "zopecount": 1,
 "timerservice": True
 }
 }))
 
 url = "http://git.erp5.org/gitweb/slapos.git/blob_plain/refs/heads/erp5-vifib:/software/erp5/software.cfg"
 software_type = "production"
 
 person = portal.ERP5Site_getAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue()
 
 request_kw = {}
 request_kw.update(
 software_release=url,
 software_title="SlapOS Master Instance 00-%i" % portal.portal_ids.generateNewId(id_group=("vifib", "kvm"), default=1),
 software_type=software_type,
 instance_xml=instance_xml,
 sla_xml="",
 shared=False,
 state="started",
 )
 
 result = person.Person_restrictMethodAsShadowUser(
 shadow_document=person,
 callable_object=person.Person_findPartition,
 argument_list=[
 url,
 software_type,
 'Software Instance', {}],
 argument_dict={'test_mode': True})
 
 if result:
 person.requestSoftwareInstance(**request_kw)
 
 message = context.Base_translateString("Your instance is under creation. Please wait few minutes for partitions to appear.")
 return context.REQUEST.get('request_hosting_subscription').Base_redirect(keep_items={'portal_status_message': message})
 else:
 message = context.Base_translateString("We are sorry. We cannot allocate your request because we are out of capacity for the software choose, please try again later!")
 return context.myspace.Base_redirect(keep_items={'portal_status_message': message})
